snippet: In his closing remarks to the jury, Charles Sherrard, the lawyer representing Kweku M. Adoboli, a former UBS trader standing trial on fraud allegations, said his client was like Spartacus because he stepped forward to take the blame for his team.
abstract: In his closing remarks to the jury, Charles Sherrard, the lawyer representing Kweku M. Adoboli, a former UBS trader standing trial on fraud allegations, said his client was like Spartacus because he stepped forward to take the blame for his team.

headline.main: Defense Compares Former UBS Trader to Spartacus
headline.print_headline: Defense Compares Former UBS Trader to Spartacus
